text: haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban phdal aoy mou sa nouv kompir( ta v rt) haey yeung ban banhchoun banda anakneasar cheahaurhe banteabpi keat . haey yeung ban phdal aoy ai sa kaun mea r yoam nouv mou chi hsaa t yeang chbasaleasa haey yeung ban pongrung roub keat tamory chi pri l . tae krobpel del anakneasar ban neamk aoy puok anak nouv avei del min srabteam bamnng robsa puok anak puok anak bercha kraeutakratm ryy? haey anakakhleah( anakneasar) puok anak ban bdeseth ning khleahtiet puok anak ban samleab
